metadata.name: Conhost Spawned By Uncommon Parent Process
metadata.comment: Detects when the Console Window Host (conhost.exe) process is spawned by an uncommon parent process, which could be indicative of potential code injection activity.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\conhost.exe')) AND (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\explorer.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\lsass.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\regsvr32.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\rundll32.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\services.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\smss.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\spoolsv.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\svchost.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\userinit.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\wininit.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\winlogon.exe'))) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('-k apphost -s apphostsvc')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('-k imgsvc')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('-k localservice -p -s remoteregistry')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('-k localsystemnetworkrestricted -p -s ngcsvc')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('-k netsvcs -p -s ncasvc')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('-k netsvcs -p -s netsetupsvc')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('-k netsvcs -p -s wlidsvc')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('-k networkservice -p -s dosvc')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('-k wsappx -p -s appxsvc')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('-k wsappx -p -s clipsvc'))) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\\\program files (x86)\\\\dropbox\\\\client\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\\\program files\\\\dropbox\\\\client\\\\'))))

output.summary: Detects when the Console Window Host (conhost.exe) process is spawned by an uncommon parent process, which could be indicative of potential code injection activity.
